verbs.description: The lawyer for Stormy Daniels , Michael Avenatti , [V: is] going all - in on his relentless attacks on popular vote loser Donald Trump and his fixer , lawyer Michael
[ARG0: The lawyer for Stormy Daniels , Michael Avenatti ,] is [V: going] [ARG1: all - in on his relentless attacks on popular vote loser Donald Trump and his fixer , lawyer Michael]
